original_text: Then some disciples of John the Baptist went to visit him in prison. They told him about all the things that Jesus was doing. So John chose two of them to go to the Lord Jesus for him.
korean_text: 요한의 제자들이 이 모든 일을 그에게 알리니

sentences.original_text: Then some disciples of John the Baptist
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 세례 요한의 제자 몇 사람이

sentences.original_text: went to visit him in prison
They told him about all the things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 모든 일에 대해 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: So John chose two of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 요한은 그들 중 두 사람을 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: to go to the Lord Jesus for him
sentences.korean_translation: 주 예수님께 그를 대신 보내기 위해
